text: @Keir_Starmer @CBItweets @MakeUK_ @The_IoD @fsb_policy @britishchambers @Keir_Starmer wanting talks about an exit before the virus has reached its peak makes about as much sense as his discussions about defeating the coronavirus & ensuring a strong economic recovery. Cloud Cuckoo Land Clown believes it's all about him🤦‍♂️🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
